item.title: Ankylosaurus Pineapple Party
item.description: * { box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: sans-serif; } .carousel { background: black; } .carousel-cell { width: 70%; height: 200px; display: -webkit-box; display: -webkit-flex; display: flex; -webkit-box-pack: center; -webkit-justify-content: center; justify-content: center; -webkit-align-items: center; align-items: center; } .carousel.is-fullscreen .carousel-cell { height: 100%; } .carousel-cell img { display: block; max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%; opacity: 0.7; -webkit-transform: scale(0.
